# shipped.fyi

> Simple feedback board, roadmap, and changelog tool for your product.

## About

shipped.fyi is a product feedback management tool that helps teams:
- Collect user feedback through a public feedback board
- Organize features with categories
- Track progress with a public roadmap
- Celebrate shipped features with a changelog
- Notify voters when their requested features ship

## Features

### Feedback Board
Public-facing board where users can submit ideas and vote on features they want built.

### Roadmap
Visual representation of what's planned and in progress.

### Changelog
Celebrate shipped features and keep users informed of progress.

### Categories
Organize feedback items by type (Bug, Feature, Enhancement, etc.)

### Voter Notifications
Users can opt-in to receive email notifications when features they voted for ship.

## Pricing

- **Free Plan**: 1 project, 50 items, core features
- **Pro Plan ($9/month)**: Unlimited projects, unlimited items, remove branding

## API

shipped.fyi is built with Next.js and Supabase. Public boards are accessible at:
- Feedback: `/{project-slug}`
- Roadmap: `/{project-slug}/roadmap`
- Changelog: `/{project-slug}/changelog`

## Contact

- Website: https://shipped.fyi
- Support: support@shipped.fyi
